oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greene Endorsement
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; military; Civil War;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Col. Samuel J. Ward, Lisbon, LA, to the C. S. A. Secretary of War, Richmond, VA: commends virtues of Francis Hagan and recommends that he be appointed quarter-master of the 8th Missouri Cavalry; on verso endorsements of Col. Colton Greene and Br. Gen. John B. Clark, Jr. for Hagan's promotion.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
